```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Base R

```{r base-knitr}
head(mtcars)
head(iris)
```

## With kable

```{r knitr-kable}
knitr::kable(head(mtcars))
knitr::kable(head(iris))
```


## With huxtable

```{r knitr-huxtable}
library(huxtable)
head(mtcars)
head(iris)
```
